story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_0100:
Whoa! They’ve already made their way into
Lear’s manor!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_0200: Actually, we led them here on purpose.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_0400:
If we battle outside, we run the risk of putting
other sync pairs in danger.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_0500:
So we decided to bring the battle inside!
After all, we have the home-field advantage here.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_0700:
To be honest, though, we’re kinda struggling since
they’re coming at us with so many people.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_0800: Then we’ve gotta hurry and take down Giovanni!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_0900:
Not so fast. We won’t allow you to meddle in
our affairs.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1100:
Sheesh, you don’t gotta be so surprised.
We’re not ghosts.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1200: Unfortunately, we can’t let you go any further.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1300:
We’ll do anything to buy our great boss, Giovanni,
some time to achieve his ambitions!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1400:
Hmph. There they go again, coming at us with
hordes of weaklings. How annoying.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1500: We’ll take them on! You all go on ahead!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1600: Yeah! We can take care of this!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1700: Well, well. Aren’t you the excited one.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1800: I’m not excited—I’m upset at you meanies!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_1900: I remember what you did back in Goldenrod City!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2000:
I heard from Kurt about all the awful things you
did to Slowpoke.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2100: You should be ashamed of yourselves!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2200:
Hmph. I was wondering who you were... You’re
that kid from Azalea Town.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2300: Thanks, you two! We’re counting on you!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2500:
There are way too many of them for just two
Trainers to take down...
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2600: Then how about two more join the fray?
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2700: Lance! Are you and your Pokémon OK now?
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2800: Yeah. We’re fine, thanks to you.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_2900:
Never fear—the strongest pair of dragon masters
from Blackthorn City is here!
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_3100:
A Champion and another Gym Leader?
Fine by me.
story_teamrocket_03_04000/2401_1001_3200: I couldn’t ask for better opponents!
